pages.text: Origins are a huge part of this modpack. Press $(#ff0000)$(k:origins.view_origin)$() to view your origin information. All origins have bonuses and debuffs, the severity ranges greatly. $(br2) If you dislike your current origin you can use $(#00ccff)$(c:/randomise)/randomise$() to get a new one.
$(#ff6600)On respawn$() you will also be $(#ff6600)reincarnated$() as a random origin!
